solution_line_template: Training all the dolphins takes {num_dolphins}*{hours_per_dolphin}= <<{num_dolphins}*{hours_per_dolphin}={total_training_hours}>>{total_training_hours} hours

They want to split the hours equally so each trainer has to train the dolphins for {total_training_hours}/{num_trainers}= <<{total_training_hours}/{num_trainers}={hours_per_trainer}>>{hours_per_trainer} hours
